page_not_found.message: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

note_description: Added notes are only stored in your browser.

home.title: Home
home.description: Check out your favorites, add notes, and follow trends to learn words you don't know.
home.trends_description: Trends show the words that other users have learned the most.
home.followed_results_description: You can see the word lists you are following.
home.notes_description: Notes create a space where you can save words you want to review later.
home.streamers_description: You can schedule a lesson with teachers for the language you want to practice.

otp.verify_error_network: Network error verifying OTP. Please check your connection and try again.

select.language: Select the main language of the list
select.target_language: Select the second language of the list

compose.warn: The more words you add, the more careful you need to be. Creating a regular and careful list will be more efficient.

landing.heroTitle: The New Way to Learn Languages
landing.heroSubtitle: Learn and share words faster with Vocapedia!
landing.feature1Description: We offer a platform where everyone can create and share their own word lists.
landing.feature2Description: You can learn words from the lists you create in a fun way through games.
landing.feature3Description: You can easily download and save the word lists you create in PDF format.
landing.securityDescription: Our application prioritizes user security by using OTP, minimizing the risk of account theft to almost zero.
landing.chromeExtensionDescription: With the Vocapedia Chrome extension, the words in the list are occasionally reminded to you, so you don't forget them.
landing.whyLearnDescription: Learning languages helps you look at the world from a broader perspective. Vocapedia accelerates and makes your language learning process efficient.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: This Privacy Policy explains how the personal data we collect when you use our application is collected, used, protected, and shared. Please review this policy carefully.

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
dataCollection.text: We collect the following personal data in our application: Name and Email: We use the OTP (One-Time Password) system for user login. Therefore, we collect your email address. Device Information: Users' device information is collected for analysis and to ensure secure access. This information is also used when creating JWT tokens.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.text: We use the collected data for the following purposes: User Login and Security: We use your email address to perform verification with OTP and ensure secure login. Data Analysis: We use device information for analysis to improve the user experience. JWT Token Management: We create JWT tokens for user authentication.

thirdPartySharing.title: Third-Party Sharing
thirdPartySharing.text: We use Google Analytics, but we do not directly share user data with third parties. Google Analytics only uses anonymous data to analyze the application's usage.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.text: We take certain measures to store data securely: API Security: Our APIs are protected with security measures such as rate limiting. Data Storage: Data is directly saved in the database, but there is no additional encryption applied in the database.

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.text: We grant users the following rights: Data Access: Users have the right to access their personal data we collect. Data Correction: Users can update their personal data. Data Deletion: Users have the right to delete their accounts and have their personal data removed.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.text: We do not use cookies in our application. Data is only stored on localStorage.

dataStorage.title: Data Storage Period
dataStorage.text: The collected data is stored indefinitely in localStorage.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.text: Our application does not collect special data from children. We do not knowingly collect data from users under the age of 13.

game-flipword.question: What is the "{to}" of "{word}" in "{from}"?
game-flipword.time_up: Time's up! The correct answer was:
game-flipword.wait_for_next: We are waiting 5 seconds before moving to the next word

compose.tour.main_lang: Select the main language for your list. This is the language you'll be translating from.
compose.tour.target_lang: Select the target language for your list. This is the language you'll be translating to.
compose.tour.list_name: Enter a name for your list. This will help you identify it later.
compose.tour.list_description: Enter a description for your list. This can include details about the content or purpose of the list.
compose.tour.word_list: Switch to the word list view to add and manage words in your list.
compose.tour.tutorial: Switch to the tutorial view to add a tutorial or explanation for your list.
compose.tour.word_type: Select the type of word (e.g., noun, verb, adjective).
compose.tour.word_lang1: Select the language of the word.
compose.tour.word_lang2: Select the language of the word.
compose.tour.new_word_button: Click here to add a new word to the current word base. You can add multiple translations for a single word.
compose.tour.new_word_base: Click here to add a new word base. A word base should consist of words that are translations of each other.
compose.tour.save_button: Click here to save your list.
